title: Scots and Catalans
itunes:title: Scots and Catalans
itunes:subtitle: Historian Sir John Elliott explores the long histories of Scottish and Catalan nationalism and considers some of the key similarities and differences between the two.
description:
Historian Sir John Elliott explores the long histories of Scottish and Catalan nationalism and considers some of the key similarities and differences between the two.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
